cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED BlocksSynth_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "BlocksSynth_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(BlocksSynth_jucer_FILE
  "${BlocksSynth_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

  PROJECT_FILE "${BlocksSynth_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "XsTycT"
)
